section.p: This is a sample FB2 document for testing the QuickReader application. FB2 (FictionBook) is a popular ebook format, especially in Russia and Eastern Europe.
The format uses XML to structure book content, making it easy to parse while preserving formatting like bold and italic text.
FB2 files can contain chapters, sections, and various formatting elements that are commonly found in books.
RSVP technology revolutionizes how we read by displaying words one at a time. This eliminates the need for eye movement, which is one of the main bottlenecks in traditional reading.
With practice, readers can achieve speeds of 500 words per minute or more while maintaining good comprehension.

cite.p: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The man who never reads lives only one."

section.p: Thank you for testing the FB2 adapter! This format is now fully supported by QuickReader.
